string-array.name: lose_insults
string-array.item: Even though I was playing with “One arm behind my back”! I’m telling all my Droid friends about this!
Yes! Yes! I won! Who’s The Droid? I’m The Droid! Yes!
But of course: my brain is much smaller than yours. Who says bigger is always better? Not a Droid!
As Descartes wrote, “I think, therefore I am.” I think several billion times a second. Whereas you… Uhm, are you sure you exist?
Maybe you should lay off the video games and hit the books. I recommend “Winning Ways for Your Mathematical Plays”.

string-array.name: win_insults
string-array.item: I wouldn’t brag too loud, were I you. I mean, come on, I was playing with “One arm behind my back”.
You rotten, dirty, no-account, lowlife, cheating scoundrel! I don’t know what you did, but it ain’t fair!
Yeah, well, even a blind squirrel finds an acorn sometimes.
Obviously you disassembled my bytecode and analyzed it to find the winning strategy. Not very sporting!
I’m so embarrassed. How can I face my friends after losing to a human?
You obviously spent too much time with “Winning Ways for Your Mathematical Plays.” You won the game, but lost your social life, didn’t you?

resources.string: You won! We make a great team, don’t we? Let’s take on that Droid again, show ’em who’s boss!
Your opponent won! Now you’ve lost face. Maybe practice more? I’ll put you in your place.
(The two devices are no longer connected. To play again, press the two-player icon.)
